00006 BeeHive::BeeHive(unsigned int numberOfBees)
00007 {
00008     //Create a list of bees
00009     m_bees = new WorkerBee*[numberOfBees];
00010 
00011     //Create each bee and initialize them
00012     for (unsigned int i = 0; i < numberOfBees; ++i)
00013     {
00014 
00015         m_bees[i] = new WorkerBee(i + 1);
00016         m_bees[i]->start(this);
00017 
00018     }
00019 
00020     //Set the number of bees
00021     m_numberOfBees = numberOfBees;
00022 
00023     //Write this into to the log
00024     char logBuffer[256];
00025     sprintf(logBuffer, "BeeHive created with %i workers\n", m_numberOfBees);
00026     GEngine::getInstance()->getLog()->writeData(logBuffer);
00027 }

00048 bool BeeHive::allIdle()
00049 {
00050 
00051     //Lock the queue mutex while we check how many jobs are waiting
00052     jobQueueMutex.Lock();
00053 
00054         int size = m_waitingJobs.size();
00055 
00056     //Unlock it once fetching the size is done
00057     jobQueueMutex.Unlock();
00058 
00059     //If there are waiting jobs then everything is definately idle
00060     if (size != 0) return false;
00061 
00062     //If not, scan through each bee
00063     for (unsigned int i = 0; i < m_numberOfBees; ++i)
00064     {
00065 
00066         //If that bee is busy then return false
00067         if (m_bees[i]->getBeeStatus() != beeIdle)
00068         {
00069 
00070             return false;
00071 
00072         }
00073 
00074 
00075     }
00076 
00077     //if the code reachs here then everythings free
00078     return true;
00079 }

00082 void BeeHive::issueOrders(WorkerJob* newJob)
00083 {
00084 
00085     //LOCK ACCESS TO JOB QUEUE/WAIT FOR ANYTHING ELSE TO CLEAR IT
00086     jobQueueMutex.Lock();
00087 
00088         //Add the job
00089         m_waitingJobs.push(newJob);
00090 
00091     //UNLOCK IT SO OTHER PEOPLE CAN HAVE A TURN
00092     jobQueueMutex.Unlock();
00093 
00094 }
00095 
00096 WorkerJob* BeeHive::beeRequestNextJob()
00097 {
00098     //LOCK ACCESS TO JOB QUEUE/WAIT FOR ANYTHING TO CLEAR IT
00099     jobQueueMutex.Lock();
00100 
00101         WorkerJob* nextJob = 0;
00102 
00103         //If there are waiting jobs
00104         if (m_waitingJobs.size() != 0)
00105         {
00106             //Get the next job from the queue
00107             nextJob = m_waitingJobs.front();
00108             m_waitingJobs.pop();
00109 
00110         }
00111 
00112     //UNLOCK HERE
00113     jobQueueMutex.Unlock();
00114 
00115     //Return the job you got
00116     return nextJob;
00117 }
